plain_text:
Dez is a dominant football player, and he's going to continue to be a dominant football player.
It's tought to see Dez go because of the type of player he was. He's one of the best players I
ever played. He's a guy that I fed off his passion.  
Garrett continued to stress how much he loves the former Cowboys wide receive and hopes they can 
have a lifelong relationship.
